summary: A mod that add's a new Merchant inside Dragons reach that sells unique potions and weapons.
descriptionHtml:
Need a boost to get you through Crafting, Sneaking and Combat easily, quickly and effectively?

Do you have to much gold to spend all at once?

Are you possible under powered or just can't stand a challenge?



THEN THIS IS THE MOD FOR YOU!



Introducing 'Verlin Novell's Ultimate Elixir Collection' Collection.



This mod adds 9, that's right 9, new potions to the game that will make
you overpowered and making the battle with that frost troll as easy as
taking a bite out that sweet role you stolen.

These potions are:

- Ultimate Elixir of Enchanting - That improves Enchanting by 500% for
60 seconds;

- Ultimate Elixir of Blacksmithing - That improves Smithing by 500% for
60 seconds;

- Ultimate Elixir of Alchemistry - That improves Alchemy by 500% for 60
seconds;

- Ultimate Elixir of Combat - That improves One-handed & Two-handed
by 500% for 300 seconds (5 minuets);

- Ultimate Elixir of Marksmanship - That improves Archery by 500% for
300 seconds (5 minuets);

- Ultimate Elixir of Protection- That improves Light Armor & Heavy
Armor by 500%

- Ultimate Elixir of Thievery - That improves Sneaking by 500% for 300
seconds (5 minuets);

- Ultimate Elixir of Pickpocketing - That improves Pickpocketing by 500%
for 300 seconds (5 minuets);

- Ultimate Elixir of Locksmithing - That improves Lockpicking by 500%
for 300 seconds (5 minuets).



And mosibly many more to follow in the near, or far, future.



[Warning! We are not resposible for loss of entire life earnings.
Shoppers Discretion is Advised!]



You can find him inside Drangonsreach in Whiterun. Probably sat on a
bench eating bread... He is available to make sales from 8AM to 8PM.
Restocks his store every 2 days.



Happy Shopping and Happy Modding!

-----

Version 1:

- Added Argonian Merchant in Dragonsreach, Whiterun

- Added 9 Potions



Version 2:

- Added 9 weaker versions of the original Potions. (Suggested by
LiamMorris2702)



Version 3:

- Bug Fix



Version 4:

- Added Ultimate Elixer of Leaning (Warrior) - Learn all 'Warrior'
abilities 2x faster for 300 seconds (5 minuets);

- Added Ultimate Elixer of Leaning (Thief) - Learn all 'Thief' abilities
2x faster for 300 seconds (5 minuets);

- Added Ultimate Elixer of Leaning (Mage) - Learn all 'Mage' abilities
2x faster for 300 seconds (5 minuets).



Version 5:

- Added a weapon with a unique enchantment;

- There is now a 1% chance of finding a Semi-Ultimate Potion in Boss
Chest's. (Not Including DLC chest's)
author: Apex-_Lupus
